About

Hey, I'm Shreya!

I've been in love with coding ever since I discovered what a few lines of code could do. I learnt about HTML, CSS and C++ in school and have been exploring the coding world ever since I stepped foot in College.

Fueled by high energy levels and boundless enthusiasm, I’m easily inspired and more then willing to follow my fascinations wherever they take me. I’m passionate, expressive, multi-talented spirit with a natural ability to entertain and inspire. I’m never satisfied to just come up with ideas. Instead I have an almost impulsive need to act on them.

I prefer to keep learning, continue challenging myself, and do interesting things that matter. I’m a fast learner, able to pick up new skills and juggle different projects and roles with relative ease.

When not coding, you'll find me surfing the internet for Tech Blogs or neck deep in a thriller fiction. I often indulge in baking and trying my hand out at competitive programming.

Projects

Ikai

File Scanning, Editing and Sharing App
| React-native, Django

• Ikai can scan, edit multimedia, share in both online and offline mode and has the chat feature to facilitate smooth remote collaboration.
• Implemented offline file sharing using TCP and rn-fetch-blob.

Rassasy

Canteen Pre-ordering System
| HTML, CSS, Javascript, PHP, SQL

• Spearheaded the development of a pre-ordering system in campus canteens for Winter of Code 2019.
• Students order in advance and the canteen manager updates their order statuses. The order and order status are dynamically rendered.

Kiwi

Key-Value Store
| Go

• Kiwi is a minimalistic in-memory key-value store written in Go.
• Implemented function to add JSON support for storing the values in JSON format and using them in GoLang format from a stored file.

Cerebro

Machine Learning Competitions' Platform
| React

• Cerebro is a platform for predictive modeling and analytics competitions for the campus.
• Implemented lazy loading in the website using React.

Kill-Zee

2D Repair Game
| Lua, Love2D

• The theme of the game is: The player saves the tower from zombies while giving the tower the time to repair itself.
• Restricted the player’s accessible boundaries, creating main menu of the game, and adding image to the player sprite.
